name: Crates
description:
Controls: WASD, Spacebar

Time to start your new job. Store the crates that come off of the conveyor belt. Go to sleep on the provided bed when there are no more crates for the day. Do not open any of the crates; your job is only to move the crates. Violation of these rules will result in consequences.

Epilepsy Warning: There are flashing images so if that bothers you, don't play this game.
